feed.title: BIP324 Proxy: easy integration of v2 transport protocol for light clients (PoC)

entry.title: BIP324 Proxy: easy integration of v2 transport protocol for light clients (PoC)
entry.summary: The initial version of the Bitcoin BIP324 proxy has been released and is now publicly accessible on GitHub. The developer acknowledges that the process took longer than anticipated but assures that the proxy is functional, albeit with potential for enhancement. The repository can be found at [https://github.com/lnliz/bitcoin-bip324-proxy](https://github.com/lnliz/bitcoin-bip324-proxy), where users are encouraged to explore its current capabilities. Feedback, suggestions for improvements, and any other comments are highly welcomed by the creator, indicating an ongoing commitment to refine and develop the proxy further. This initiative represents a significant step forward in the development and implementation of the BIP324 protocol, highlighting both its current usability and the opportunity for community involvement in its evolution.
